channel.title: Removing MySQL Please HELP! $5 if fixed!
channel.description:
Okay, I just downloaded a new source and I have no idea how to remove MySQL from it. This is what my Run.bat says when I run it. And if it helps I'm using the base Tempest which was InnovationX and BattleScape
Anyways heres the Run.Bat [code][HOOK]: Sucessfully started. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 29ms. Connetion rejected, Wrong username or password, or ip is banned, or host is down . Communications link failure due to underlying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection refused: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:351) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:213) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:200) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:366) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:529) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:478) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:375) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:218) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at DatabaseConnection.createConnection(DatabaseConnection.java:57) at DatabaseConnection.<init>(DatabaseConnection.java:49) at Server.main(Server.java:73)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 20 ms ago.com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsExcept ion: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection refused: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:351) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:213) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:200) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:366) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:529) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:478) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:375) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:218) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:65) at vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:93) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 20 ms ago.
Unable to connect to MySQL at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) at vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:65) at vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:93)[HOOK]: Sucessfully started. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 29ms.[/code]
If you think you can fix add my msn maxacollins@gmail.com

item.title: Removing MySQL Please HELP! $5 if fixed!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:1, topic:410383”]Okay, I just downloaded a new source and I have no idea how to remove MySQL from it. This is what my Run.bat says when I run it. And if it helps I’m using the base Tempest which was InnovationX and BattleScape

Anyways heres the Run.Bat

[code][HOOK]: Sucessfully started.
[SERVER]: Loaded maps in 29ms.
Connetion rejected, Wrong username or password, or ip is banned, or host is down
.
Communications link failure due to underlying exception:

** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **

java.net.ConnectException
MESSAGE: Connection refused: connect

STACKTRACE:

java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:351)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:213)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:200)
at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:366)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:529)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:478)
at java.net.Socket.(Socket.java:375)
at java.net.Socket.(Socket.java:218)
at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja
va:173)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.(MysqlIO.java:267)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.(Connection.java:1553)
at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java
:266)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185)
at DatabaseConnection.createConnection(DatabaseConnection.java:57)
at DatabaseConnection.(DatabaseConnection.java:49)
at Server.main(Server.java:73)

** END NESTED EXCEPTION **

Last packet sent to the server was 20 ms ago.com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsExcept
ion: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:

** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **

java.net.ConnectException
MESSAGE: Connection refused: connect

STACKTRACE:

java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:351)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:213)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:200)
at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:366)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:529)
at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:478)
at java.net.Socket.(Socket.java:375)
at java.net.Socket.(Socket.java:218)
at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja
va:173)
at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.(MysqlIO.java:267)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.(Connection.java:1553)
at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java
:266)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185)
at vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:65)
at vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:93)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

** END NESTED EXCEPTION **

Last packet sent to the server was 20 ms ago.

Unable to connect to MySQL
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814)
at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.(Connection.java:1553)
at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java
:266)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582)
at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185)
at vBulletin.connect(vBulletin.java:65)
at vBulletin.run(vBulletin.java:93)[HOOK]: Sucessfully started.
[SERVER]: Loaded maps in 29ms.[/code][/quote]

It would be a much simpler task to just setup the database, than to remove it from the server. Judging by the stacktrace, just about everything is kept in the database. Player saving, highscores, and forum integration.

Read full topic
